title: Compiler panic while parsing source code
body:
I'm getting a Rust compiler panic while compiling for x86_64-unknown-l4re-uclibc
(from GNU/Linux), but the backtrace  looks as if there were a problem while parsing the Rust source itself. A crate without macros works fine. The crate that I'm getting the panic with makes heavy use of macros. It could even be that one of the macros is syntactically not correct.
Please let me know if you need more information.

```
     Running `rustc --crate-name l4 lib.rs --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,link -C opt-level=3 -C metadata=4c8d090999c9849b -C extra-filename=-4c8d090999c9849b --out-dir $L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/x86_64-unknown-l4re-uclibc/release/deps --target x86_64-unknown-l4re-uclibc -L dependency=$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/x86_64-unknown-l4re-uclibc/release/deps -L dependency=$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/release/deps --extern libc=$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/x86_64-unknown-l4re-uclibc/release/deps/liblibc-c67e31bbc170de3d.rlib --extern num_derive=$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/release/deps/libnum_derive-752bc9a2f64320be.so --extern num_traits=$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/x86_64-unknown-l4re-uclibc/release/deps/libnum_traits-45ee2a2c478d9ae8.rlib -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib/amd64_gen/l4f -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib/amd64_gen -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib/amd64_gen/l4f -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib/amd64_gen -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib -g -C opt-level=3`
thread 'main' panicked at 'called `Result::unwrap()` on an `Err` value: "read_option: expected 0 for None or 1 for Some"', libcore/result.rs:1009:5

end of query stack

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports

note: rustc 1.30.0-dev running on x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu

note: compiler flags: -C opt-level=3 -C opt-level=3 --crate-type lib

note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden

error: Could not compile `l4`.

Caused by:
  process didn't exit successfully: `rustc --crate-name l4 lib.rs --crate-type lib --emit=dep-info,link -C opt-level=3 -C metadata=4c8d090999c9849b -C extra-filename=-4c8d090999c9849b --out-dir $L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/x86_64-unknown-l4re-uclibc/release/deps --target x86_64-unknown-l4re-uclibc -L dependency=$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/x86_64-unknown-l4re-uclibc/release/deps -L dependency=$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/release/deps --extern libc=$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/x86_64-unknown-l4re-uclibc/release/deps/liblibc-c67e31bbc170de3d.rlib --extern num_derive=$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/release/deps/libnum_derive-752bc9a2f64320be.so --extern num_traits=$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/pkg/l4re-rust/l4/l4-rust/OBJ-amd64_gen-l4f/x86_64-unknown-l4re-uclibc/release/deps/libnum_traits-45ee2a2c478d9ae8.rlib -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib/amd64_gen/l4f -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib/amd64_gen -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib/amd64_gen/l4f -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib/amd64_gen -L$L4RE_BASE/obj/l4/amd64/lib -g -C opt-level=3` (exit code: 101)
```
